content.question: In lines 1-3 (Ago...indulsisti), Pliny thanks Trajan for

choices.label: giving him and his relatives such competent helpers
giving the rights of citizenship to people close to him
cautiously granting citizenship to Alexandria’s freedmen
quickly granting freedom to Pliny’s enslaved relatives

content.answer: giving the rights of citizenship to people close to him

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
